LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.MinTitleOrder: Minimum title with Order for operation: {0}
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.MinTitleCybercrime: Minimum title with crime for operation: {0}
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.ReputationCybercrimeDesc: Reputation allows you to get new titles in the crime environment.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.ReputationOrderDesc: Reputation allows you to get new titles from the Order.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.TitleCybercrimeDesc: Each new title in the crime environment gives you additional power and influence. Along with this, the Order will pursue you with special zeal.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.TitleOrderDesc: Each new title in the Order gives you additional power and influence.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.Title: Title
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.ContainersIsNull: There are no goods in the selected category
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.ContainerPurchase: The merchant is ready to provide a specified quantity of goods at a specified price. The pricing policy is determined by your title. If it's too low, the merchant will refuse you a deal.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.ContainerSale: The merchant is ready to redeem a specified quantity of goods at a specified price. The pricing policy is determined by your title. The higher your title, the more effective your sales are..
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.BuyMouseText: This operation will cost you {0} reputation with faction {1}.
LanguageData.Darknet.GUI.CardsDesc:
The cards represent a game of chance.
You need to choose one of 5 cards and pay {0} silver fee to start the game.
In case your chosen card matches the desired card, you get {1} silver. Otherwise, your bet will expire and you will receive nothing.
The Order condemns gambling. Each new attempt will ruin your reputation with him.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.LowTitle: Your title is too low to perform an operation with {0}.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.Purchase: The deal was successfully completed. You have lost {0} reputation with faction {1}.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.NotEnoughTitle: Your title is too low to perform an operation.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.AnswerIsNull: Fill in all the fields for your answer.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.BadAnswer: At least one of the coordinates turned out to be false. Hack failed.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.PersonHacked: {0} has been successfully hacked. Reputation with faction {3} increased by {2}. Faction {1} is now hostile to you.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.AlreadyHacked: You have already tried to hack {0}.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.ResurrectionSphereActiv: Resurrection sphere applied. The dead have risen.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.InvulnerabilitySphereAc: Invincibility sphere has been activated. {0} immune to any damage for the next few hours.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.LowArmorCharges: Requires at least {0} charges to activate.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.LowTitleOrderForUse: Your Order title must be at least R{0} to use your abilities.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.LowTitleCybercrimeForUs: Your crime title must be at least R{0} to use your abilities.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.CardIsNull: Select a map to start the game.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.TrueCard: You have won the game. Silver will be delivered in capsules.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.FalseCard: You have lost the game. Your bet goes to {0}.
LanguageData.Darknet.Messages.ReputationCards: Reputation with faction {1} reduced by {0}. The reason is gambling.
